Thank you for purchasing and using Realistic Car Controller!

Package contains all necessary scripts, models, and sound effects for ready to use in any personal / commercial project. However, you can't redistribute/resale/modify and resale/reskin and resale any asset in the project.

Skyline, Driver Sofie, her animations, and her car model made by "3DMaesen". You can access 3DMaesenâ€™s asset store from this link;
http://u3d.as/2vg

You don't have to give credits, but if you do I would be very grateful. I always would like to see your game in action with RCC.

You will find detailed documentations in the "Documentation" folder also.

Best Regards,
Bugra
